title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 270-1.2 - Severability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 270-1.2 - Severability

State Regulations

If any provision of Part 270 or 271 of this Title, or its
application to any person or circumstance, is held invalid, it is hereby
expressly declared to be the intent of the commissioner that the remainder of

Part 270 and/or Part 271 of this Title and the application thereof to any
person or circumstances shall not be affected thereby. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
270-1.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
